mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dancing Brought Me Back to Life", "National Folk Dance Updated", "So They Gave Up Football Pt. II", "What Are They Dancing?", "Big Events of 1982", "Quarterly Movement Report", "Asilomar S'82" and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Discovery", "Take A Good Look", "Experimental Notes", "Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging The Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "Ammunition", "On the Record" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
